scripts.build-all: npm run build-project1 && npm run build-project2 && npm run build-project3 && mkdir -p build && cp -r react-masterclass/build build/project1 && cp -r movie-app/build build/project2 && cp -r cultural-event-info/build build/project3
scripts.build-project1: (cd react-masterclass && npm install && npm run build)
scripts.build-project2: (cd movie-app && npm install && npm run build)
scripts.build-project3: (cd cultural-event-info && npm install && npm run build)
